Simple extension to block YT Shorts
Block YouTube Shorts effortlessly with this simple browser extension.

Hide Shorts for YouTube - Streamline Your YouTube Experience

Are you tired of constantly encountering YouTube Shorts while browsing through your favorite videos? The "Hide Shorts for YouTube" extension is here to give you full control over your YouTube experience. This extension allows you to hide the Shorts section from your YouTube homepage, providing a cleaner, more focused browsing environment.

Key Features:
Remove YouTube Shorts: Automatically hide all YouTube Shorts from your feed, giving you a streamlined experience focused on the content you enjoy most.
Seamless Integration: This extension works effortlessly in the background, ensuring that your YouTube experience remains uninterrupted and free from Shorts clutter.
Simple to Use: 

Safe and Secure:
We prioritize your privacy and security. "Hide Shorts for YouTube" does not collect any personal data, and it operates solely within your browser to modify the appearance of YouTube. Your browsing habits and personal information remain entirely private.

Get Started:
Transform your YouTube experience today by installing the "Hide Shorts for YouTube" extension. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused platform tailored to your content preferences.

The extension has premium features for $49.99 and you get unlimited access
